Description: All Windows-based devices with names starting with "WS-" (standard workstations).
All Windows-based devices with names starting with "NB-" (notebook laptops).
All Windows-based devices with names starting with "TB-" (tablet devices).
All Windows workstations, notebooks, or tablets configured for multi-user scenarios.
All Windows 365 Cloud PCs identified by names starting with "W365-".
All Azure Virtual Desktop instances identified by names starting with "AVD-".
All MDM-managed Windows devices eligible for Windows Autopatch.
All devices registered with Windows Autopilot (ZTD ID present).
Windows Autopilot devices ordered as workstations (OrderID:WS).
Windows Autopilot devices ordered as notebooks (OrderID:NB).
Windows Autopilot devices ordered as tablets (OrderID:TB).
Multi-user workstations provisioned through Windows Autopilot (OrderID:WS-MU).
Multi-user notebooks provisioned through Windows Autopilot (OrderID:NB-MU).
Multi-user tablets provisioned through Windows Autopilot (OrderID:TB-MU).
All MDM-managed Windows devices eligible for Windows Autopatch.
All Windows devices joined directly to Microsoft Entra ID (formerly Azure AD).
All Windows devices joined to both on-premises AD and Microsoft Entra ID.
All MDM-managed Apple iPhones and iPads.
MDM-managed iPhones only.
MDM-managed iPads only.
iOS devices that are not enrolled in MDM.
MDM-managed Android devices using the Work Profile deployment scenario.
Fully managed Android Enterprise devices.
